Testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
Testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers say about our services.

testimonial1.name: John Smith
testimonial1.content: Very satisfied with the quality of repair. My iPhone works like new after screen replacement.

testimonial2.name: Mary Johnson
testimonial2.content: Fast and professional service. They replaced my battery in 30 minutes, and now my phone lasts all day.

testimonial3.name: David Brown
testimonial3.content: Excellent service at a reasonable price. Recommend to anyone having phone issues.

testimonial4.name: Sarah Wilson
testimonial4.content: Saved my phone after I dropped it in water. Very grateful for the quick help!

About.aboutSubtitle: Learn more about our phone repair service
About.storyPart1: Founded in 2010, our phone repair service started as a small shop with a big vision: to provide high-quality, affordable repairs for all types of mobile devices.
About.storyPart2: Over the years, we've grown into a trusted name in the industry, with a team of certified technicians who are passionate about what they do.
About.storyPart3: Today, we continue to expand our services while maintaining our commitment to quality, affordability, and customer satisfaction.

Pricing.pricingSubtitle: Transparent pricing for all our repair services
Pricing.priceNote: All prices are approximate and may vary depending on the specific model and extent of damage.
Pricing.premiumDescription: Complex repairs with extended warranty and priority service

Services.pageDescription: Professional mobile device repair with quality guarantee and fast service

screenReplacement.name: Screen Replacement
screenReplacement.shortDescription: Fast and quality screen replacement for all models
screenReplacement.fullDescription: Our specialists perform professional screen replacements for smartphones of any brand. We use only original or high-quality compatible parts, which guarantees excellent image quality and long service life.

batteryReplacement.name: Battery Replacement
batteryReplacement.fullDescription: Over time, smartphone batteries lose capacity and discharge faster. We offer professional battery replacement using quality components that will restore your device's battery life.

boardRepair.name: Board Repair
boardRepair.fullDescription: Motherboard repair is one of the most complex procedures that requires high qualifications. Our masters have many years of experience in diagnosing and repairing boards, solving problems with connectivity, power, and other components.

screenProtection.name: Screen Protection
screenProtection.fullDescription: Protect your device from scratches and damage with professional installation of protective glass or film. We guarantee perfect application without air bubbles and dust.

phoneCleaning.name: Phone Cleaning
phoneCleaning.shortDescription: Professional cleaning from dust and dirt
phoneCleaning.fullDescription: Over time, dust, dirt, and other contaminants accumulate in your device, which can affect its performance. We offer professional cleaning of both external and internal components of your smartphone.

waterDamageRepair.name: Water Damage Repair
waterDamageRepair.shortDescription: Rescuing devices after contact with liquid
waterDamageRepair.fullDescription: If your device has been exposed to water or other liquid, it's important to act quickly. Our specialists will conduct professional cleaning and restoration of components affected by moisture, maximizing the chances of full functionality restoration.
